lead_paragraph: The No. 11 seed V.C.U. is a win away from the N.C.A.A. final thanks in part to the fierce, energetic play of point guard Joey Rodriguez.
snippet: The No. 11 seed V.C.U. is a win away from the N.C.A.A. final thanks in part to the fierce, energetic play of point guard Joey Rodriguez.
